text:
Mano, what's with your cheeks?
They're a bit red...

Oh, um...
Maybe I accidentally touched them.

Well, this morning, I made a promise to take Pii-chan
for a walk, but I got a bit flustered with preparations.

Pii-chan nudged me a bit,
like, "Hurry up!"

I see...
So even Mano and Pii-chan have those moments.

Hehe, but when you get all flustered
and say, "Oops, I did it", it's just so cute...

Good morning!
Oh, Mano, Hiori! Good morning!

Hey, Mano, what's wrong with your cheeks?!
They're red!
